data.title: Put Your Passion Into Motion
data.meta_description: A collection of the finest E-Mountain Bikes, Apparel, Parts & Accessories in existence from the biggest brands in the world, a hand-picked and carefully curated selection of what we would ride or wear ourselves.
data.text:
Weapon of Choice Weapon of Choice Weapon of Choice

We hand-picked a selection of the very best E-MTBs to guarantee you an unrivalled riding experience. Visit our store to get up close and personal with your next bike.

The Bikes

Haibike

With advanced technology, superior craftsmanship, and outstanding performance, experience the exhilarating ride and discover the true power of biking with Haibike!

Specialized

With a long history of pushing boundaries and breaking new ground, Specialized design takes you further. Their perfect balance of speed and comfort provides a great experience for exploring trails and adventures.

Husqvarna

The Husqvarna e-mtb range has been designed to meet the highest expectations of alternate mobility and provide you with an effortless, enjoyable, and sustainable ride – no matter what terrain you’re tackling.

Pivot Cycles

Pivot Cycles brings you the future of e-bikes. With their revolutionary suspension technology and designs, their bikes are built to tackle the toughest terrain.

Giant

Pushing the boundaries of cycling innovation since 1972, Giant bikes are built lighter and faster and dedicated to inspiring adventure in all riders, from casual to competitive. Experience trail-conquering rides with cutting-edge technology.

GasGas

GasGas has pushed the boundaries of performance and design with their signature blend of agility, reliability, and adrenaline-pumping thrills, these powerful electric mountain bikes will give you the freedom to explore the off-road like never before.

Cannondale

Cannondale's electric mountain bikes provide riders with next-level power, performance, and control. Whether you're a seasoned adventurer or just starting out, Cannondale's cutting-edge technology and minimalist design will ensure provide riders with the ultimate experience.

Scott

A stunning lineup of electric mountain bikes that embody the perfect fusion of style, performance, and innovation. From reliable and efficient models to powerful and stylish designs, Scott e-bikes are the perfect companion for your next adventure.
